title: Fake Call for watch wearable
summary: By clicking a button on watch, you will get a face call on phone in 3 seconds.
description: You can initiate fake call from your wearable smart watch device.Looking for a good excuse to get out of somewhere?Touch one button on your watch then you will get a fake call on your phone in 3 seconds.The wearable watch device has to be connected with the phone over bluetooth.This app also works independently on the phone too by stating an app.
descriptionHTML:
You can initiate fake call from your wearable smart watch device.

Looking for a good excuse to get out of somewhere?
Touch one button on your watch then you will get a fake call on your phone in 3 seconds.
The wearable watch device has to be connected with the phone over bluetooth.
This app also works independently on the phone too by stating an app.
